alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 10 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Salle and west central McMullen Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Los Angeles, or 15 miles southeast of Cotulla, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zella and Fowlerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
